replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
需要1.8客户端进入还需ViaRewind
[其它]ViaRewind——让你的1.8-1.12服务器支持1.7.X和1.8.X客户端进入[1.8-1.12]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-775811-1-1.html

replies.author: 龙猫酱~
replies.txt_content: 用viaversion和viaback这两个都装上去试试 而且好像本来也不兼容1.8和1.7.

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content:
你要安装.3个插件
ViaBackWards
Viaversion
ViaRewind
